personal.name: Biswajit Nath
personal.title: Sr. Software Engineer
personal.summary: Versatile Sr. Software Engineer with 6+ years of comprehensive experience in front-end and back-end technologies. Proficient in all phases of software development, from conceptualization to implementation. Skilled in Java, Angular, JavaScript, React, and various other technologies. Proven leadership experience mentoring teams and driving technical excellence.

experience.description: Promoted to Sr. Software Engineer in July 2024. Developed advanced features for SIEM applications using Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, Solr, React, MySQL, Snowflake, Kafka, Athena, and S3. Implemented search and storage functionalities for incidents, enhancing application performance. Led a project team of 6 members and mentored junior developers.

experience.position: UI UX Developer â†’ Sr. UI UX Developer
experience.description: Promoted to Sr. UI UX Developer in July 2020. Spearheaded the architecture and creation of an AI-powered emotion analysis platform. Led team of 6 members, designed intuitive user interfaces, and facilitated requirements gathering. Leveraged Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, Adobe XD, React, and AWS.

projects.name: SIEM Security Analytics Platform
projects.description: Next-generation security analytics platform using machine learning and advanced analytics to detect, investigate, and respond to security incidents with deep visibility and actionable insights.

projects.name: AI-Based Emotion Analysis Platform
projects.description: AI-driven platform for content quality assessment through user testing campaigns, analyzing emotions, reactions, eye tracking, and head movements to provide comprehensive user engagement insights.

projects.name: Indoor Localization Mobile App
projects.description: Innovative Android application for indoor localization utilizing advanced triangulation and trilateration techniques for precise positioning in indoor environments.

projects.name: University Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive student feedback collection system and department management portal for Assam University with modern responsive design and efficient data management.
